daily_fact: As the sun sets after 6pm for the last time until spring, New Yorkers can savor cozy evenings, perfect for enjoying a warm drip coffee at Shinola in Tribeca.
topline_md: Recent updates from NYC include a tragic incident where a woman was killed by a flying solar panel during a nor'easter, the launch of a new domestic violence unit by the NYPD, and ongoing debates among mayoral candidates regarding housing reforms and responses to Trump’s policies.
